titles.title: For the relief of Margaret M. LeBus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/7/1999--Introduced. Deems a named individual, for purposes of determining her eligibility for hospital insurance benefits under the Social Security Act for a certain period, for the entirety of such period to have been entitled to disability insurance benefits under the Act for 23 calendar months.
